TopicTitle: Beta is coming to an end, but for a new race of cat explorers, it was their defining moment...

Articles.Content:
CATS: All your space are belong to us

Former human masters tremble and quake in their shoes as an army of housecats descend upon the Space Center! Taking command of the logistics wing, they ship strange cat-eared contraptions to the assembly building! A former NASA asteroid interception mission is retasked to carry a hastily assembled Cat Exploration Vessel into orbit - to begin its one year mission to seek out space tuna and unravel the secrets of intergalactic yarn!

It reads like something out of pulp fiction and it might as well be, but the Kitty Space Program plays out like The Cat From Outer Space in reverse!

Featuring custom ship modules by Tim Yam, it's my final tribute to KSP Beta - enjoy!

Meow lander mod page:

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/229570-the-meow-lander
